nycTheatreExcerpt: When crafting Back To The Future The Musical, if there is one thing you have to get right, it's time travel. When you take Tim Hatley's scenic design, and mix it with Finn Ross' video projection work and Tim Lutkin's lighting, there's no easier way to say it than it creates theatrical magic.
